title: My front camera is unable to focus.
content:
Hi there. 

I sent my phone to the service centre to get my Pixel 2 XL's speakers fixed. I also requested the battery to be replaced. In the process, my screen broke, and it was replaced FOC.  

However, I suspect that during the process of replacing my screen, the front camera was damaged, or dust/dirt could have gotten into it. 

My front camera has been blurry, unable to focus at all. When I use the front video, it was as if I has the beauty function turned on. It's extremely bad. 

I have tried restoring the app to factory settings, tried clearing the cache and using it in safe mode. All of this methods doesn't help. 

Please advice on this matter as I really do not wish to send my phone to the repair center once more as the wait was quite long, and my daily work relies heavily on this phone.
